europeana:record.dc:title: The Odonata of Sulawesi and Adjacent Islands. Parts 1 and 2
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Tol, van J.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Odonata; Celebophlebia; Diplacina; Taxonomy; Distribution; Sulawesi1); Indonesia
europeana:record.dc:description: One new species of the up to present monotypic genus Celebophlebia Lieftinck, C. carolinae spec. nov. from Sangihe, as well as all Sulawesi species of the genus Diplacina Brauer, including two new species and one new subspecies, viz., D. militaris dumogae subsp. nov., D. torrenticola spec. nov. and D. sanguinolenta spec. nov, are described. The relationship and distribution of all species included is discussed2).
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: The Odonata of Sulawesi and Adjacent Islands. Parts 1 and 2 (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 61) (Issue 13)
